Source.Name: gtk-engines
Source.Summary: gtk-engines provides a central location for commonly used GTK+ engines.
Source.Description: gtk-engines provides a central location for commonly used GTK+ engines. Including Clearlooks, Crus, Glide, HC, Industrial, Lua, Mist, Redmond and Thinice
